import React from 'react'; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import blank1099 from '../../images/blank1099.png'; // local 1099 const canvg = require('canvg') const jsPDF = require('jspdf') class Preview1099 extends React.Component { createCanvas(){ //SVG data var svg = document.getElementById('editor'); var data = (new XMLSerializer()).serializeToString(svg); //Create canvas var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'); canvg('canvas', data, {useCORS: true}); } downloadPDF(){ var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'); var imgData = canvas.toDataURL("image/jpeg", 1.0); //Create PDF var pdf = new jsPDF({ orientation: 'p', unit: 'in', format: 'letter', }); //Add Image at Scale pdf.addImage(imgData, 'JPEG', 0, 0, 8.5, 6); pdf.save("1099.pdf"); } render() { let fontStyle = {fontSize:'12px', fontWeight:'600'} let fontColor = 'blue' let formImage = blank1099 let imageWidth = '883px' let imageHeight = '600px' console.log('payer', this.props.payer) console.log('tax year', this.props.taxYear) email.email income.rent income.royalties income.other income.federal_tax_withheld income.non_employee_comp income.s409a_income income.s409a_deferrals income.fish_boat income.medical_payments income.substitute_payments income.direct_sales income.state_tax_withheld income.state_tax_id income.state_income payer.name payer.tin payer.street payer.city payer.zipcode payer.phone recipient.name recipient.tin recipient.street recipient.city recipient.state recipient.zipcode recipient.account_nbr recipient.FATCA taxYear.year taxYear.isVoid taxYear.isCorrected let payer = { name:'Joe Test', street:'123 Fake Street', city:'Fakeland', state:'CA', country:'USA', zipcode:'92822', phone:'888-888-8888', tin:'123412341234', } let recipient = { name:'Fred Test', street:'123 Fake Street', city:'Fakeland', state:'CA', country:'USA', zipcode:'92822', tin:'123412341234', } let income = { FACTA:true, account_nbr:'123412341234', rent:'1234.12', royalties:'1234.12', other:'1234.12', federal_tax_withheld:'1234.12', non_employee_comp:'1234.12', s409a_deferrals:'1234.12', s409a_income:'1234.12', fish_boat:'1234.12', medical_payments:'1234.12', substitute_payments:'1234.12', direct_sales:true, crop_ins:'1234.12', golden:'1234.12', attorney:'1234.12', state_tax_withheld:'1234.12', state_tax_id:'12341234', state_income:'1234.12' } return (

); } } function mapStateToProps(state) { return{ taxYear: state.taxYear, payer: state.payer, recipient: state.recipient, income: state.income, email: state.email } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return bindActionCreators({ }, dispatch ) } Preview1099 = connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Preview1099); export default Preview1099;
